The gear joint connects two joints that must be either prismatic or revolute joints. Using this joint requires that the joints it uses connect their respective bodies to the ground and have the ground as the first body. When destroying the bodies and joints you must make sure you destroy the gear joint before the other joints.
trans-unit.target: 齿轮接头连接两个必须是棱柱形或旋转接头的接头。使用此关节需要其使用的关节将其各自的主体连接到地面，并以地面为第一主体。破坏车身和关节时，必须确保先破坏齿轮关节。

The geometry drawn by the supplied function sets invisible stencil values of pixels, instead of setting pixel colors. The stencil buffer (which contains those stencil values) can act like a mask / stencil - love.graphics.setStencilTest can be used afterward to determine how further rendering is affected by the stencil values in each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供的功能绘制的几何图形将设置像素的不可见模板值，而不是设置像素颜色。模板缓冲区（包含那些模板值）可以像遮罩/模板一样工作-love.graphics.setStencilTest之后可以用来确定每个像素中模板值对进一步渲染的影响。

trans-unit.source: The geometry drawn by the supplied function sets invisible stencil values of pixels, instead of setting pixel colors. The stencil values of pixels can act like a mask / stencil - love.graphics.setStencilTest can be used afterward to determine how further rendering is affected by the stencil values in each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供的功能绘制的几何图形将设置像素的不可见模板值，而不是设置像素颜色。像素的模版值可以像遮罩/模版一样工作-love.graphics.setStencilTest之后可用于确定每个像素中的模版值如何影响进一步的渲染。

trans-unit.target: 使用love.graphics.setColor设置的全局颜色。如果启用了全局伽玛校正，则将已经对其进行了伽玛校正。

trans-unit.source: The graphics coordinate system and love.graphics.getHeight use units scaled by the screen's DPI scale factor, rather than raw pixels. Use getHeight for calculations related to drawing to the screen and using the coordinate system (calculating the center of the screen, for example), and getPixelHeight only when dealing specifically with underlying pixels (pixel-related calculations in a pixel Shader, for example).
trans-unit.target: 图形坐标系和love.graphics.getHeight使用通过屏幕的DPI缩放因子（而不是原始像素）缩放的单位。使用getHeight进行与绘制到屏幕和使用坐标系有关的计算（例如，计算屏幕的中心），仅在专门处理基础像素时才使用getPixelHeight（例如，在像素Shader中与像素有关的计算）。

trans-unit.source: The graphics coordinate system and love.graphics.getWidth use units scaled by the screen's DPI scale factor, rather than raw pixels. Use getWidth for calculations related to drawing to the screen and using the coordinate system (calculating the center of the screen, for example), and getPixelWidth only when dealing specifically with underlying pixels (pixel-related calculations in a pixel Shader, for example).
trans-unit.target: 图形坐标系和love.graphics.getWidth使用通过屏幕的DPI缩放因子（而不是原始像素）缩放的单位。使用getWidth进行与绘制到屏幕和使用坐标系有关的计算（例如，计算屏幕的中心），仅在专门处理基础像素时才使用getPixelWidth（例如，在像素Shader中与像素有关的计算）。

trans-unit.source: The hot spot is the point the operating system uses to determine what was clicked and at what position the mouse cursor is. For example, the normal arrow pointer normally has its hot spot at the top left of the image, but a crosshair cursor might have it in the middle.

trans-unit.source: The id value of a specific touch-press is only guaranteed to be unique for the duration of that touch-press. As soon as love.touchreleased is called using that id, it may be reused for a new touch-press via love.touchpressed.

trans-unit.source: The interpolated per-vertex color. Used as the color argument to the pixel shader effect function. Writable in the vertex shader. Use this variable to change the per-vertex or constant color in the vertex shader.
trans-unit.target: 插值的每个顶点的颜色。自动设置的值 ConstantColor * gammaCorrectColor(VertexColor) 在爱0.10.0和更新，或 VertexColor 在0.9.2之前和老，在顶点着色器的位置被调用的函数。用作像素着色器效果功能的 color 参数。可在顶点着色器中写入。使用此变量可以更改顶点着色器中的每个顶点或常量颜色。

trans-unit.source: The interpolated per-vertex texture coordinate. Automatically set to the value of VertexTexCoord in the vertex shader before the position function is called. The particle system has to be created using love.graphics.newParticleSystem. Just like any other Drawable it can be drawn to the screen using love.graphics.draw. You also have to update it in the update callback to see any changes in the particles emitted.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用love.graphics.newParticleSystem创建粒子系统。与其他任何Drawable一样，可以使用love.graphics.draw将其绘制到屏幕上。您也可以更新它的更新回调看到发出的粒子的任何变化。

trans-unit.source: The particle system won't create any particles unless you call setParticleLifetime and setEmissionRate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您调用setParticleLifetime和setEmissionRate，否则粒子系统不会创建任何粒子。

trans-unit.source: The passed function draws to the stencil instead of the screen, creating an image with transparent and opaque pixels. While active, it is used to test where pixels will be drawn or discarded. Image contents do not directly affect the stencil, but see below for a workaround.
trans-unit.target: 传递的函数绘制到钢网而不是屏幕上,创建一个透明和不透明像素的图像。当激活时,它用于测试像素被绘制或丢弃的位置。图像内容不会直接影响到钢网,但请看下面的变通方法。

trans-unit.source: The passed function is called with six parameters for each pixel in turn. The parameters are numbers that represent the x and y coordinates of the pixel and its red, green, blue and alpha values. The function should return the new red, green, blue, and alpha values for that pixel.
trans-unit.target: 传递的函数依次为每个像素调用六个参数。参数是代表像素的x、y坐标及其红、绿、蓝和alpha值的数字。该函数应返回该像素的新的红、绿、蓝和alpha值。

The pattern is repeated to complete the line. Using the repeat will stretch the pattern and multiplies each 1 and 0. For example if three 1s are consecutively placed they are stretched to six if the repeat is 2. The maximum repeat is 255, and the minimum repeat is 1.
trans-unit.target: 重复的图案可以完成这一行。使用重复将拉伸图案,并将每个1和0相乘。 例如,如果连续放置三个1,如果重复是2,则将被拉伸为6。 最大重复是255,最小重复是1。

trans-unit.source: The pause key on an American layout.

The per-frame metrics (drawcalls, canvasswitches, shaderswitches) are reset by love.graphics.present, which for the default implementation of love.run is called right after the execution of love.draw. Therefore this function should probably be called at the end of love.draw.
trans-unit.target: 每帧指标（绘画调用，画布开关，着色器开关）由love.graphics.present重置，对于love.run的默认实现，将在执行love.draw之后立即调用它。因此，可能应该在love.draw的末尾调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: The pixel colors of what's drawn are compared to the existing pixel colors, and the smaller of the two values for each color component is used. Only works when the "premultiplied" BlendAlphaMode is used in love.graphics.setBlendMode.

trans-unit.source: The pixel colors of what's drawn are multiplied with the pixel colors already on the screen (darkening them). The alpha of drawn objects is multiplied with the alpha of the screen rather than determining how much the colors on the screen are affected, even when the "alphamultiply" BlendAlphaMode is used.

trans-unit.source: The pixel density inside the window might be greater (or smaller) than the "size" of the window. For example on a retina screen in Mac OS X with the highdpiwindow flag enabled, the window may take up the same physical size as an 800x600 window, but the area inside the window uses 1600x1200 pixels. love.window.fromPixels(1600) would return 800 in that case.
trans-unit.target: 窗口内的像素密度可能大于（或小于）窗口的“大小”。例如，在Mac OS X的视网膜屏幕上启用了 highdpi 窗口标志的情况下，该窗口可能会占用与800x600窗口相同的物理尺寸，但是窗口内部的区域使用1600x1200像素。在这种情况下， love.window.fromPixels(1600) 将返回 800 。

trans-unit.source: The primary responsibility for the love.graphics module is the drawing of lines, shapes, text, Images and other Drawable objects onto the screen. Its secondary responsibilities include loading external files (including Images and Fonts) into memory, creating specialized objects (such as ParticleSystems or Canvases) and managing screen geometry.

The pulley joint simulates a pulley with an optional block and tackle. If the ratio parameter has a value different from one, then the simulated rope extends faster on one side than the other. In a pulley joint the total length of the simulated rope is the constant
trans-unit.target: 滑轮接头模拟一个带可选滑块和滑轮的滑轮。如果比率参数的值与1不同,那么模拟绳的一侧延伸速度就会比另一侧快。在滑轮接头中,模拟绳索的总长度为常数。

trans-unit.source: The pulley ratio of the joint.

The purpose of a Quad is to use a fraction of an image to draw objects, as opposed to drawing entire image. It is most useful for sprite sheets and atlases: in a sprite atlas, multiple sprites reside in same image, quad is used to draw a specific sprite from that image; in animated sprites with all frames residing in the same image, quad is used to draw specific frame from the animation.
trans-unit.target: 四边形的目的是使用图像的一小部分来绘制对象,而不是绘制整个图像。它对精灵图谱和精灵表最有用:在精灵图谱中,多个精灵驻留在同一图像中,quad用于从该图像中绘制特定的精灵;在动画精灵中,所有帧都驻留在同一图像中,quad用于从动画中绘制特定帧。
